report.title: Shorewatch records
report.description: Report designed for displaying sightings for Shorewatch.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences o LEFT JOIN locations l on l.id=o.location_id LEFT JOIN samples occSamp on occSamp.id=o.sample_id LEFT JOIN samples parentSamp on parentSamp.id = occSamp.parent_id LEFT JOIN users u ON (u.id=#current_user#) LEFT JOIN person_attribute_values pav ON pav.person_id=u.person_id AND pav.person_attribute_id=#my_sites_person_attr_id# AND pav.int_value=parentSamp.location_id AND pav.deleted=false LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lav ON lav.location_id=parentSamp.location_id AND lav.location_attribute_id=#private_location_attr_id# LEFT JOIN location_attributes la ON la.id=lav.location_attribute_id LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values savstart on savstart.sample_id=parentSamp.id and savstart.deleted=false and savstart.sample_attribute_id=#start_time_sample_attribute_id# LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values savend on savend.sample_id=parentSamp.id and savend.deleted=false and savend.sample_attribute_id=#end_time_sample_attribute_id# LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oavadults on oavadults.occurrence_id=o.id and oavadults.deleted=false and oavadults.occurrence_attribute_id=#adults_occurrence_attribute_id# LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oavcalves on oavcalves.occurrence_id=o.id and oavcalves.deleted=false and oavcalves.occurrence_attribute_id=#calves_occurrence_attribute_id# JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl on ttl.id = o.taxa_taxon_list_id JOIN surveys sv on sv.id=parentSamp.survey_id JOIN websites w on w.id=o.website_id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND (l.created_by_id=#current_user# OR ((((la.id=#private_location_attr_id# AND lav.int_value=0) OR (pav.int_value=l.id) OR (lav.id is null) ) AND #hide_all_other_users_private_sites# = '1') OR ('#hide_all_other_users_private_sites#' = '-1') ) )

param.name: idlist
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence IDs to filter by.

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: current_user
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating that the user owns the record.

param.name: volunteer_id
param.description: Name of volunteer to filter by.

param.name: date_from
param.where: (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR o.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date))

param.name: date_to
param.where: (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR o.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date))

param.name: region_id
param.description: Provide a region to display records for
param.join: JOIN index_locations_samples rfilter ON rfilter.sample_id=o.sample_id and rfilter.location_id=#region_id#

param.name: location_id
param.description: Provide the location to display records for
param.join: JOIN index_locations_samples lfilter ON lfilter.sample_id=o.sample_id and lfilter.location_id=#location_id#

param.name: location_name
param.description: Provide an Other Site location to display records for

param.name: my_sites_person_attr_id
param.description: Id of the my sites person attribute

param.name: my_own_locality
param.where: l.created_by_id=#current_user# OR pav.id IS NOT NULL

param.name: high_certainty_only
param.display: Verified and High Certainty Sightings Only

param.name: private_location_attr_id
param.description: The location attribute ID used to store whether a site is private

param.name: hide_all_other_users_private_sites
param.display: Hide all other users private sites
param.description: Hide all private sites in the sites list that are not 'my sites' for the supplied user.

param.name: start_time_sample_attribute_id
param.description: The sample attribute ID used to store the start time

param.name: end_time_sample_attribute_id
param.description: The sample attribute ID used to store the end time

param.name: adults_occurrence_attribute_id
param.description: The occurrence attribute ID used to store the number of adults

param.name: calves_occurrence_attribute_id
param.description: The occurrence attribute ID used to store the number of calves

column.name: taxon
column.sql: CASE WHEN o.preferred_taxon=o.default_common_name then o.preferred_taxon ELSE o.preferred_taxon || COALESCE(' | ' || o.default_common_name, '') END

column.name: recorder
column.sql: CASE WHEN w.id IN (#website_ids#) THEN '' ELSE w.title || '-> ' END || CASE WHEN LENGTH(o.recorders)>30 THEN 'Recorder' ELSE o.recorders END

column.name: belongs_to_user
column.sql: CASE CAST(o.created_by_id AS character varying) WHEN '#currentUser#' THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: sc
column.sql: case o.record_status when 'C' then case o.certainty when 'C' then 'green' when 'L' then 'orange' when 'U' then 'red' else 'blue' end when 'V' then 'green' when 'D' then 'orange' when 'R' then 'red' else 'black' end

column.name: fc
column.sql: case o.record_status when 'V' then 'green' when 'D' then 'orange' when 'R' then 'red' else 'blue' end

column.name: input_form
column.sql: case when parentSamp.input_form is null then '#default_input_form#' else parentSamp.input_form end
